namuth hama palathurakma garbhani samayedi sudusuyi kiyala anumatha karanna baha.
eheth ee lankawe di kerena prisiddha wiwadayak bawata pathwu wita mata batahira widyawawa pattapal boru bawa thawath wishala pirisakata therum kara dimata haki wanu atha. (2015 juni 24)
eheth aya ema githaya gayana kirima aaramba kirimath samangama mulu shalawama nagi sita ath polasan dennata wiya.
(hondayi tuthpest wage eewa beda hada ganna puluwani, eeth lip bam ekak wage deyak sheyar karaganna bahane.)
yaksha nam iparani jana kottashaya me mi mure pradeshaya awata athithaye janawasha athikaragena siti bawata wishwasayak thibenawa.
ee nirmana samangin aluth rangana karyayakata man sudanam.

mema nirmanaye mulika aramuna kumakdayi pahadiliwa sandahan kota nomathi wuwath meya diyawadiyawa wani rogawalin pelena rogin aramunu karagena nipadawuwak bawa balu balmatama pennenata thibena karanayak.

menna me prashne nam:
boho gatumwaladi menma mehidi da deparshwayema jiwitha winasha weyi.
kese wethath simbabwe pila inima aarambhaye sitama wegayen lakunu raskaramin jayaga්rahanayata pasubima sakas karaganimen shri lankawe balaporoththu sunwiya.

nagita ganna bari weddi
bohoma amaruwen monawa hari korala eda wela hoya ganna mattame apita eeka sahena wasiyak...

sariyata mara lassanayi.
oya thiyenne badu..
passe dawasaka halapa kament ekakin ahalath thibba ko ara kukulage kathawa kiyanne nadda?
nawa pa්rakopakaranayan sandaha padanam ha militari aaka්ramanaya sandaha aluth kadathura me wana witath sudanam keremin thibe.

niwutan kiyanawa wishwaye thiyana oonama anshu dekak ho wasthu dekak kochchara kuda wunath ekinekata ada gannawalu (aakarshanaya karanawalu) ehema ada ganne ekak aneka matha balayak athi karalalu...anshuwala ee hadila thiyana drawya pramanaya (skandhaya) wadi weddin balayath wadi wenawalu...anshu athara dura wadiweddin balaya adu wenawalu...dura degunayakin wadi weddin balaye wishalathwaya kalin wage hatharen ekak aadi widihata aduwenawalu...meka puthe bhauthika wasthu gana kathawak..manasika aakarshanaya gana nam meka patalawa ganda epa onna...
habayi udagu kalinich ara.

amathyanshayanta wenkarana mudal waya kala ha waya kerena aakaraya idiri wadapiliwela pilibandawa mewayedi sakachcha kerina.adala amathyanshayan bhara niyojya amathiwaru, amathyansha lekamwaru saha ee ee aayathana pradhanihu me raswimwalata ekwiya.waraya ha guwan sewa niyojya amathiwarun wana rohitha abegunawardhana, dayashi්ratha thisera, amathyansha lekam ke. wi. pi. ranjith da silwa, aarakshaka amathyansha lekam gotabhaya rajapaksha mahathwaru me awasthawata ekwa sitiyaha.

deshiya aadayam komasaris janaral ayiwan disanayaka, niyojya komasaris janaral nadun guruge athulu niyojya komasariswarun rasakage sahabhagithwayen pawathi me wadamuluwa sandaha kolambaa disthrikkaya niyojanaya karana upakaraka panthi gurubhawathun wishala pirisak sahabhagi wuha.
ohu thakshanaya athin royi dayas mahathata pamanak deweni we yayi ekala katha bahata kan yomagena siti mata asannata labuna.

pasuwa ee siyalla mariya maniyan ge madhyastha kamata bhara karamin thaman samaga "namo mariya " yaduma oppu karannayi unwahanse santha pithara chathurashrayata raswa siti wanadana karuwanta arayum kaleya.
eke wadiyenma balapu miyusik wediyowath meka..
me praharaya nawasilanthaye krayischarch palliyata ellawu praharayen pasuwa salasum kala praharayak yayi adahas palawana namuth eya waradi adahasaki.
renu renu pirichcha mal bima watila hariyata chiththa reddak wage gaha yata.

balashakthi ithiri, mehi aarambha
walnashaka, dilira nashaka, krumi nashaka aadi pulul wishayak krushi rasayana yannen aawaranaya weyi.
me nisa apa paharadima arambaiya yuthu yayi owuhu kiwoya.
anek athata batahira ratawal wisinda me anthawadi pa්rawanatha thamange upayamargayanta anukulawa hasuruwamin sitithi.

emanisa yudha hamudawe aakaraye widhi widhanawalin yuth palanayak sahitha kalamanakarithwa krama kramayen bahara kirima siduwemin pawathi.emenma samuhika kriya mangin sahayogaya labadima, manawa anthar kalamanakaranaya thulin manawa anthar sambandhaye sankirna thaththwayan pilibandawa awadhanaya yomu kirima wani karunu gana me wana wita awadhanaya yomuwi atha.
ohuge mul nama hariya.
thathwaya palanaya karalayi thiyenne.
meya obata pamanak athi gataluwak yayi kisiwitekawath nosithanna.
me kruthiya athule thiyana samaja, sanskruthika, aarthika hadathala darana manawa sambandhatha prekshakayata kiyawa ganimata pahasukam sapayannek washayen wicharakayek awashya wenawa.
pahugiya durakathana amathum 20 ka rekordin ahanna puluwan.
ammath, lokkith, math ee dilisena male diha ahipillan nohela bala innawa mama hinahi, hinahi bala hitiya.
ara sayiwar kadawal wala thiyana thadi bola wage parippu wadewala ageta mada badila thiyenne kohomada appa...

yahapalana rajaya yatathe sanwardhana wada katayuthu rashiyak kriyathmaka kala bawa pawasu wikramasinha mahatha rata akriyawa pawathina warthamana thaththwaya nisa ema sanwardhana wada piliwela nathara wi athi bawath haki ikmanin prajathanthrawadaya yali sthapitha kara janathawata ahimi wu siyalla yali laba dimata katayuthu karana bawath wikramasinha mahatha mehidi awadharanaya kaleya.

eewa thama api kana paranama kek..

rupiyal ek koti this lakshayak watina raththaran biskat 20 k thama sirure guda margaye sangawa gena meratata paminimata thath kala shri lankika guwan magin dedeneku katunayaka guwan thotupole di regu niladharin wisin athadanguwata gena thibe.
